page.title: 10HARMBY AREA -EATING & HEALTH
page.content: THERE IS ONE DOCTORS SURGERY WITH THREE DOCTORS TO SERVE THIS AREA.THEIR SURGERY IS AT LEYBURN A MILE AWAY.THE NEAREST CHEMISTS SHOPS ARE AT LEYBURN TOO.THE COUNTY CLINIC IS ALSO AT LEYBURN. THAT IS WHERE THE DISTRICT NURSES AND HEALTH VISITORS ARE BASED. CHILDREN CAN GO THERE FOR DENTAL TREATMENT.PEOPLE ARE VERY CONSCIENTIOUS ABOUT CARING FOR THEIR TEETH AND VISIT THE DENTIST REGULARLY. SCHOOL CHILDREN ARE EXAMINED REGULARLY BY THE SCHOOL NURSE,DOCTOR AND DENTIST.ON THE WHOLE PEOPLE IN THIS AREA ARE FAIRLY HEALTHY.PEOPLE'S EATING HABITS ARE CHANGING.THEY NO LONGER EAT THE PLAIN FOOD THEY USED TO EAT BUT LIKE TO TRY CONTINENTAL AND ORIENTAL FOOD.
